message.content: {"given_definition_quality":40,"better_definition":"to listen","sentence":"他们在听歌。","image_prompt":"A group of people sitting together, listening to music. The scene is peaceful and soft, under city ruins with gentle light filtering through, giving a sense of a quiet apocalypse. Everyone is relaxed, enjoying the song together in the 'soft apocalypse animation' style—gentle pastel tones, subtle overgrown nature reclaiming the space, and old buildings in the background.","sentence_translation":"They are listening to songs."}
